tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL @MissyDoom @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL , I am truly aghast. I was certain that the odour nuisance guideline would be exceeded, but to hear that the health-based guidance is exceeded is truly astonishing. To think the residents of Newcastle were vilified for daring to complain, yet science backs them.

Bearing in mind that the 30-minute peak in the previous monitoring exercise was 44.5, it‚Äôs clear my constituents are being subjected to a major and ongoing environmental incident.

I trust the culprits will be properly held accountable by @EnvAgencyMids.

So @EnvAgencyMids it took a whopping 13 days of monitoring to discover the WHO 24hr H2S limit is being breached and exceeded by a full 3rd by the gas from #WalleysQuarry. When do we get to see the rest of the data? How often is it breaching the "annoyance" limit? @StinkStopthe

How many face coverings did you see littered on your last beach walk?

Litter spoils the places we enjoy and can make its way into the sea and possibly harm marine life.

Bring a bag for your #litter when you go outdoors and take it home to dispose of.

#BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/5XocwdLO82

tweets.text:
This definition extreme circumstances is biblical level once in a generation flooding. 
I know 2020 was a shit year but I don't remember it raining for 365 days of the year if fact we had a straight week of temperatures over 30¬∞c and extreme of a different kind for England.

urls.title: Sewage discharged into rivers 400,000 times in 2020
urls.description: Waterways in England had sewage discharged into them for three million hours

tweets.text:
2018 800,000 hours pumping Sewage into rivers and last year it was revealed in 2019 they pumped for 1,500,000 hours and I said ¬£1000 they beat it this year well in 2020 they pumped for 3,100,000 hours more than double at this rate 2025 equals 49,600,000+

https://t.co/Hdxc3yBnA3

This ITV report is as shocking as yesterday‚Äôs news from the @EnvAgency . This is the death of an iconic river in slow motion - largely due to unmitigated agricultural pollution. The intensive poultry industry needs to clean itself up ASAP for starters @thenoblefoods https://t.co/d1pmbc1Fug

This is happening even without the impact of EDF Sizewell C's 10+ metres sea wall. No wonder Suffolk residents are alarmed EDF won't disclose design of sea wall & EDF believe it's ok to only protect their own site disregarding impact on neighbours 
@PINSgov @EnvAgency @The_ONR https://t.co/FX6CvLkfu7

@StaffordshireCC @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @PHE_WestMids After reading this I am ashamed to have paid my council tax today. I live 2 miles from the landfill. To tell me to close my windows and wait for the odour to clear before opening them again is an insult. This  odour enters my home as I sleep at night, windows & doors shut.

Our Kent's Magnificent Moths project starts todayüòÄ Working with organisations like @NaturalEngland @Natures_Voice & @EnvAgency this project supported by @HeritageFundUK will help to save some of the UK's rarest and most special moths #mothsmatter @savebutterflies @BCKentBranch https://t.co/H6ukA3tZez

@Cap_it_off @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe And that‚Äôs ok is it? To experience nausea, dizziness and irritation of airways on a daily basis?!? Really!?! In this country you think that‚Äôs acceptable for a child let along everyone else. Trying living with it yourself üò°@PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2

@JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency U should be paying tribute to the people of Newcastle under Lyme and stoke because of the suffering we endure because you allow it. You at the EA are very good at patting each other on the back but not so good at actually protecting people truly and wholeheartedly. @StinkStopthe

Six fire engines are still at the large fire on Carlisle Street in #Sheffield.

Firefighters are working with partner organisations @SheffCouncil, @EnvAgencyYNE to bring the fire under control.

People are advised to keep doors and windows closed if there is smoke in their area. https://t.co/Jhn8vd28Lh

tweets.text: When poisonous fumes invade my house my throat is sore&I need to use my asthma inhalers.They often come at night.I can‚Äôt sleep with the fear&anxiety of what it‚Äôs doing to my young son.When will you act?@EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @BorisJohnson @MPGeorgeEustice

tweets.text: Local people feel like their homes are a ‚Äúprison‚Äù due to landfill fumes.Incredibly sad after the first warm spring day yesterday when ‚Äòoutdoor‚Äô meet ups are mandatory @BorisJohnson @MPGeorgeEustice what are you going to do about it? U cannot stay silent! @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe

tweets.text: @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids one week with no stench, no inhaler and no pregnancy problems. Tonight is as bad as it was end of Feb and I‚Äôm lying here on my spacer and having the same pains I did when I was rushed to hospital just over a week ago. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC it's nights like last night that we need people on the ground investigating the smell from #WalleysQuarry, it seems to have been intense and to have spread far and wide across the borough. 4 hours broken sleep. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL

Newcastle under Lyme residents calling the @EnvAgency between 2&4:30am last night as the smell was so bad they couldn‚Äôt sleep! This is an atrocious quality of life & how are they expected to work today? Time for change @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe

@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency Massive areas of Newcastle and Stoke kept awake by the horrid stink coming from the landfill again last night. @RedIndustries2 How can you fix the problem if you don't acknowledge is coming from you?!!!! #capitoff

@LianaJane @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe I‚Äôm poolfields, spent the first 14 weeks in EPU with bleeding that only ever came the day after the stench. No problems whatsoever when the smell isn‚Äôt there!
Have you reported it to your doctor??
@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg  @ClareDinnisEA  The smell from. @RedIndustries2 from 1.30ish to 8am was horrendous. Why cant @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency do something to stop it. @StinkStopthe #walleys

And Maybank is at least a mile further away than my sons nursery where the children often breathe in fumes all day. Appalling. National shame @BorisJohnson - this needs stopping now to protect our children before there are serious health repercussions @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency https://t.co/6jJhtyxjYH

tweets.text: Really really sad, we‚Äôve been lucky the last few days but have been in exactly the same position waking with nausea & the air thick with the distinctive hydrogen sulphide fumes. Frightening situation for us. Act now @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe https://t.co/zc4r6CGlEw

Hi @RachSalv, can you help us? We're a community plagued by noxious gasses coming from a poorly run landfill that is far to close to houses. Easily the most complained about site in the UK and the @EnvAgencyMids failed us for years. Can you help?

@njbrough88 @StinkStopthe @LianaJane @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids This sounds dreadful. Have they checked if you have high levels of hydrogen sulphide in your system? If you do may be worth discussing risks with a consultant to be on the safe side. Hope all‚Äôs well with the baby honey ‚ù§Ô∏è
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA  Please advise the gas is in our houses what should we do? #wecantbreath https://t.co/ctNIZ2a45U

tweets.text: Another night another stench #stinkgate #stopthestink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency enough is enough!
@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA I've got masking tape taping up any draught but there comes a point when a house with no air In it becomes a tomb.
@RedIndustries2 Why are you doing this to us? @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency This can't be ok someone F*cking help us!!! https://t.co/fNT8OcYtl6

@stephenbaddeley @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency They couldnt give a Toss. Check where they live. It's a case of 'I'm ok Jack'. Although when criminal proceedings begin they may cast a glance. !!

@stephenbaddeley @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @stephenbaddeley they're writing a 300 pg report, should be ready in around 2 yrs. They absolutely can't do anything until this is written. Once we have that, @NewsNBC will write a report , for another 2 yrs.  Gives enough time for @RedIndustries2 to fill the remaining cells.
@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe My house got flooded with landfill gas last night, everything stinks downstairs now, contaminated and polluted !!!!!

@annjsmall @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA I drove past the site at just after 8 last night and it was horrific. I'm fortunate I live 2 miles away but I get it some days too. I suggest @ClareDinnisEA needs to experience it for herself because I'm amazed the people living nearby have been as patient as they have.
@shamytaw @StinkStopthe @WendyMa48697963 @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @BorisJohnson It's just horrendous, no escape from this toxic nightmare.
